3.3 Compilation

3.3.6 Linkers

Functional Developer offers you a choice of linkers to use to link your Dylan programs. The default linker is a GNU linker. If you have the Professional or Enterprise Edition of Functional Developer, and own Microsoft Developer Studio, you can use Microsoft's linker instead. See the Linker page of the main window's Options > Environment Options... dialog.

Getting Started with Functional Developer - 31 MAR 2000
